评论详情: This dress is perfect for both athletic activities and casual outings. The square neckline and short sleeves give it a flattering and modern look, while the built-in shorts add functionality and comfort. The fabric is soft, breathable, and stretches just the right amount, making it great for sports like tennis or golf.  The addition of pockets is a thoughtful touch, offering convenience without compromising style. It fits true to size and feels great throughout the day. I highly recommend this dress for anyone looking for a blend of fashion and practicality!

Beautiful dress- I am around a size 8 [5'5, 155 lbs, pear shaped] and the Medium fits perfectly. I have returned and/or disliked almost all the clothing I got on amazon, but I took a chance with this. It looks amazing and the compression makes me feel very secure. Not built in bra but with the compression you can get away without one. It is a bit much for every day as it is short and the square neck is pretty low [for myself, I am sure others can rock it!] so I am using it for when I want to dress up a bit but it is HOT AF out [like going into the city for brunch in 90 degree humid weather!]. Love the built in pocket on the shorts too. Overall I am soo happy I got this it feels like a good staple for a wardrobe hole I had in the summer!
This dress fits true to size and holds everything in. It is very sturdy, double lined and has the perfect amount of stretch. The color is so flattering and the matierial isnt too think.

Very cute athletic dress that I got tons of compliments on at Disney. Love the built in shorts with pockets underneath. For fit I got a size small and for reference I am 5’3 and 125 pounds. No need to wear a bra with this dress either. Material is stretchy and comfortable. Red color was vibrant and came as pictured. Perfect length and fit, easy to get on and take off. Buy this dress!

This is the cutest & most comfortable athletic dress I own. I’m very picky on my materials & the quality of fabric used in athletic styles and this dress is well made. The fabric & stitching is well done. The material itself is not too thick, it’s breathable. I am in between sizes- I’m a M/L depending on stretching of fabrics. I have an athletic build (powerlifter), weigh 170lbs; Hips 45”, Bust 32”, Waist 30”, Thighs 25”. This dress smooths & tightens in all the right places. I probably could’ve sized down for a tighter fit to a medium, but I like to be able to have some room in my outfits so I am happy ordering the L! When going to the bathroom you do have to pull it over your shoulders so if you are more broad there I would consider sizing up as to not wear & tear the stitching on the arm area from taking on/off. This dress does not have padding on the top. I don’t feel like it’s needed since it’s double lined but if you have more going on up top that’s something to consider.  If you’re debating ordering this dress just go ahead and order it. You won’t regret it!!

Love this dress but I’m sad that after I washed it some of the seems came undone the material was so soft and thick plus it has a body suit under it and it has packets!!!!  I love it ….it is true to size I’m 5’2 240 I got an xl

This is my new favorite golf dress! The color is so flattering in the sun, the shorts underneath are vented and comfortable (they even have a pocket for balls) and the cut of the top is flattering. I would probably size up for more comfort, though; my small was true to size but slightly form fitting.

I absolutely loved it! The fabric is high-quality. I washed it before wearing it, and it didn’t lose its color or shape, which is a big plus. This dress exceeded my expectations! I highly recommend. I’m already planning to buy it in another color! The size is right I am M normally and bought M and fit perfectly.

评论概述: Returned due to bra straps showing.
评论详情: I ended up returning the stress simply because my bra straps are showing, so maybe I need to buy different bras or bras that connect in the back or something. However, the dress looked absolutely adorable on me and fit me so well. I may try to order a similar dress just maybe with a different cut to cover up my bra straps. I like that it was so stretchy, but yet my waist looked so snatched. Cute dress.

Im a size XL, about a 14 in jeans, 36DD. The dress actually fit cute! It’s very stretchy and a fresh breathable material. I feel that you can wear this dress very casual but you can also dress it up! At least the black color one. Also you don’t need a bra since it has great boob support!  I would most definitely purchase more colors (:

I got this super cute little sporty dress to wear at a music festival . I originally had planned to wear it with white cowboy boots and turquoise belt but it was day 3 and I was tired and my feet hurt so we made it sporty lol .. it was extremely comfortable! I ordered in both medium and large and found the large to be too big . So kept the medium! I am 5’5, 160lbs curvy build . I want this in other colors! It’s that good! Also, didn’t need to wear a bra with this! I am a 32g and felt supported the whole time! Highly recommend!

So comfy and cute! Had shorts underneath and has some stretch. Really easy to just thrown on and run errands or go to lunch. Can easily be dressed down or dressed up. Will be buying more colors in the summer

This dress is EVERYTHINGG. I am 5'5" and 125 lbs and I got s size S. It fits perfectly and sucks me in where I need. The fabric is very durable and it is double lined at the top so you don't need to wear a bra! 10/10

I love it. It fits well. The material keeps you all tight and in place. There are pockets in the shapewear which is interesting, they aren’t on the outside of the dress but underneath. It is awkward going to the bathroom and having to practically take the entire dress off. I know some shapewear companies are starting to have cut outs for easy access. Good quality. Would recommend
Very cute dress, could be dressed up for a night out or worn casually.
hermoso, buena calidad, tela gruecita asi que ayuda a hormas el cuerpo, si te gusta algo mas ajustado una talla menos te quedara hermosa, muy lindo vestido
Easy to pack, comfortable and cute. It was a little low cut for me so I wore a tank under it.
Super versatile and comfortable. I feel I can wear it to play tennis and go to the club too

This dress was a lifesaver at Disney World! It was so comfortable and easy to wear all day long, even in the Florida heat and humidity. The fabric is lightweight and breathable, but it also kept me dry when I got caught in a sudden downpour. I loved the [insert specific detail about the dress, like the color, pattern, or style]. It was perfect for twirling around in front of the castle and taking pictures. I would definitely recommend this dress to anyone visiting Disney World!
Overall I like this dress however it is not very thick material and does not have much if any compression around the stomach area. Overall stretchy and flattering to my shape
Very nice I recommend 100% reference lbs170 got a large.
Love this and it’s so comfy and flattering, true to size. Only “annoying” this is going to the bathroom having to take it all off but can’t wait to wear this in the summer

Love this dress! I'm one who has been gaining a bit of weight, so I decided to size up to a medium, when normally I'm a small. I am a 5'7" tall girl with a bit of curves and wide shoulders. This fit nicely! A bit tighter than I expected, but it was snug. I thought about sizing up to a large for future purchases, but I feel like it would be too big at that point.  NOTE!! The shorts are cozy, a bit shorter than expected, but I guess that is more due to my height. They also ride up a lot when walking! You will be constantly pulling them down so you are not in a wedgie the whole time. Also, if you order the brown for exercising, note that the sweat marks are super noticeable!!! Went to NYC recently with this on and within two minutes of walking, I had boob sweat marking all underneath and had to go purchase a flowy dress to avoid the stares. Although that was on me to wear this on a hot day, it shows that if you are to use it to exercise, expect sweat marks.  Overall, love the dress, have gotten many complements on it, and recommend sizing up!
It’s very nice, it sucks you in, but the lining is see though, also if you’re tall it will be a little short for you, I’m 5’7 and it was no way I was going to bend over wearing it lol

If I could give it 6 stars I would. Don’t consider it, GET IT. This dress is it!! I’m have a mommy body and let me tell you, I don’t need any shapewear or a bra to wear this dress. It is so form fitting and cute for any occasion. I need one in every color. I don’t even play tennis haha.
I was literally stopped in the street for a link to this dress. So cute, so flattering. Seriously just buy it. I got another color I love it so much!

I’m so mad I got this dress at the end of summer. They fit like a glove and hide a multitude of sins. I would have worn these all season! It smooths everything out and you want to keep running your hands over the fabric. It’s so smooth and comfy. You feel so svelte in it. I will be buying more! The color was true to what was on the website.
Arma hermoso el cuerpo y hasta trae bolsillos, la tela es súper buena (no es fina ni deforma). La falda es alta pero sin rayar lo obsceno. Me encantaaa.

Wore this dress to Epcot for a Disney bound village Belle. It was super comfortable and breathable, the only downside was using the bathroom with it but that was my own fault for not reading the entire description but even still it was easy to get off and on  when using the bathroom!

评论概述: Didn't fit, but was super cute
评论详情: I'm 5'10" with broad shoulders (20" across) and a 41" chest. Unfortunately, the Large and XL didn't fit because of my broad shoulders. I'm still giving it five stars because the cut was really flattering, the material stretchy and thick, and the length was just right. If it wasn't for the tight fit around my arms and shoulders, I would have kept it. Even though the XL was tight in the chest, it would have still be doable even with a padded bra. I ordered a darker color and the light blue, and my bra lines were visible through the light blue but not the black. As with most tall people, empire cut dresses usually don't sit right, but this one wasn't bad. I wish it fit better, I would have gotten more colors :(

Unfortunately this is another athletic dress that does not pass the bend over test for me. I love the trend but I need shorts under the dress that keep the *cheeks* in check, and this one does not. Other than that, the chest is a tad loose but the overall fit is nice. The lining is an athletic mesh material that is very comfortable. Will return bc the shorts turn into bikini coverage. But I found  that the coverage from the WENLIA dress is perfect!!

I absolutely love the fit and style of this dress and have it in 3 different colors. I get compliments almost anytime I wear it. It is true to size. I love that there are built in shorts with pockets. Super cute! Highly recommend!
Loved this! But I as a curvy girl would recommend a size up
I was impressed with the thickness and quality of the fabric. Fit well, snug but not too tight or short. Comfortable and cute. Highly recommend.
This dress is so comfortable and it fits just perfectly. It gives your body a nice shape. Very stretchy and the fabric is soft.

If you’re above six feet tall it may look like the photo, but otherwise this thing is long, clunky, wide and not at all as photographed.  I am fit and average height - 5’4” at 125 lbs/athletic build with probably 8-10 lbs to lose to be ideal weight. This dress looked absolutely frumpy on me, when this shape/cut is normally ideal for someone who has the ‘inverted triangle’ build with a bit of shoulder and hips. I like my bras, tanks and dresses to have that square-ish cut.  The quality of the materials was good, though, and the color was on point with the photo.

For reference I’m 5’6 and about 164lbs. I chose a large. I didn’t want it super tight so I chose a size large and it fit perfect. I was worried about it being too short since I have long legs and kind of tall. But it was perfect. It’s somewhat supportive. You can still see my belly through a little bit but I still felt good in it. It’s super soft and buttery feeling. This material is definitely high quality and stretchy. The pockets on both sides underneath is amazing. I put my phone in the pockets. I want it in a bunch of other colors now, especially the red for Christmas 🎄❤️ buying it in multiple colors! 😍

This dress is great, very flattering and the fit is chefs kiss! The pockets are perfect for a phone or tennis ball but not much more. The shorts and bodice of the underneath are an almost mesh so it’s really breathable but not see through!!!
The material is stretchy and comfortable. The neckline is flattering as is the built in shapewear and shorts

评论概述: It's my smoothie for the day.
评论详情: I like it so much, I'm getting another.
easy and classy dress to throw on. fits smaller in the waist and a little tighter in the chest. the square neck line is a little bit deeper than i imagined but overall super cute!
Material and color are great and just like the picture. Just wish it compressed the torso area.
No pensé que fuera a quedar tan lindo. La calidad superior de lo que imagine. Compraré otro color
Ladies don’t walk to get this dress run!!!! I didn’t think this would be plus size friendly but it is and it’s so cute…I will be buying them in every color!!
This is a super cute, quality fabric. Comfortable and size is perfect for my teenage daughter!

I will say that the fabric isn’t very forgiving so be mindful when choosing undergarments. The dress was also very short I’m nearly 5’8 and this is how it fit me. I’m also a year postpartum with a pooch. Overall loved the stretchiness and style.

This dress looks almost as if it was painted on while being worn. It is very tight and holds curves I didn't even know I had. 4 stars because its cute, a little too tight, but if you went larger it might be too large, gets dirty pretty easily but that could be user error because I'm clumsy. All in all its very fitting and very cute.

评论概述: Love, but runs a bit small
评论详情: I love this dress, the quality is great and a super cute style. Runs a bit on the smaller, shorter side. I’ll be purchasing another color but going a size up just for comfort!

I don’t like tight wearing dresses bc of hip dips/weight; but this dress make me feel more confident with my body. I saw girl with my measurements get an XL and mention it was baggy, so for a more form fitting fit i suggest sizing down. Usually I would get an XL, but I got a large in Chestnut. Also for my big booty girls, it’s covers perfectly with shorts (with POCKETS) under <3 My measurement are… 175-180 pounds; 5”4; C cup

评论概述: It’s very complimentary to any person
评论详情: This dress can fit anywhere from a person that’s 59 weighs 170 pounds to a person that’s 511 that weighs 170 pounds it complements anybody due to the style and the undergarment pulls you in and makes you look slender, The material is elastic and it makes you feel supported but it is very breathable it’s a great buy for the price the pocket underneath his nice if you want to put your drivers license and your credit card in there you can wear it anywhere from the Apple Orchard to a bar without changing

I’ve been on the hunt for a tennis dress that I like since they started getting trendy a couple of years ago. I’m incredibly picky with my shape and typically don’t like spaghetti straps and honestly need something that I can wear a bra with. This was a win all around. I can wear a bra, it has a high back so I’m not worried about bra strap showing in the back either, and I love the little cap sleeves because they are very flattering, the tummy area is Fitted, but Not skin tight.  shorts underneath are a great length. Over the last couple of years, I have probably bought and returned at least 15 tennis dresses and this is the first one I am keeping. Athletic material and feels like it will wear nicely.
Super cute and so comfy

I usually am between a small and medium depends on brand. I am 5'2" and 135lbs. Old Navy I am a small. Certain clothes from target or Nordstroms I am either a small or medium but prefer a medium. For this dress I am a size large. Medium felt tight every where and it felt like an extra small. I like a bit of wiggle room and there was none with this dress if I stayed with a medium. Over-all the style is super cute and plan to exchange for a large.
size up
Sized up for length and is still very short. However the material sucks you in and makes your figure look wonderful and the shorts are very comfortable and breathable.
Runs small so size up. Shows every bump on your body so don’t think it hides our little flaws. Material is  on the thicker size but there is no compression.

Guys. I cannot explain to you how obsessed I am with this dress. I haven't worn it out or longterm yet, but it might be my new favorite dress. It is so comfortable and extremely flattering. I love that it feels like you could dress it up or down. I ordered a medium and it fits perfectly. I was nervous, since lately I fluctuate between a medium and a large, but I definitely think the sizes might be on the larger end of the spectrum, so I would go with your lower size if you're between two. Fabric is as expected, buttery, not too constricting, but still feels a bit shaping. I don't know, I love it and feel confident in it. I'm tempted to buy it in more colors. It might suck when you're out and have to use the bathroom, but I didn't want to buy the "easy" one, I was looking for a dress body suit. Highly recommend

评论概述: Cute but Rode Up/Difficult to Take Off
评论详情: I bought this dress over the summer but wore it for the first time on Saturday. I wear a size 14 in pants so bought an XL dress in black. The dress fit well and looked nice but it rode up so much! I kept having to pull the skirt down so I didn't flash anyone. Maybe it was the way I walk or my specific body structure but I found the dress difficult to wear due to this issue.  Plus, going to the bathroom is difficult because there are no zippers or buttons on the dress and it has built-in shorts. I had to wiggle my arms out of the dress and then pull it down to use the bathroom. It wasn't impossible but it was inconvenient and time consuming.  The dress is very cute but it has some definite drawbacks so be prepared!

评论用户: Very pretty, and easy to put together. Used it for a baby showe
评论详情: Love the feel of the fabric, very well made. The material lining inside is like a workout breathable fabric which makes it comfortable to wear. Only issue is it's difficult to take off/put on because it's a skort dress.
Cute fit but long. Feels like it should be shorter to be proportional

I’m 5’5, about 200 lbs, bra size 34FF, and I bought the XL. The top fits nicely and I don’t have to wear a bra with it which was a pleasant surprise. It’s snug and thick enough to make my waist look good but stretchy enough that I don’t feel like I’m being suffocated or trying to squeeze into it. It does show my belly a bit more than I usually like, but it’s smoothing so it’s not bad. I bought this for a costume, but I like it so much I will probably buy it in another color as well.

This is a very nice black little dress. It is form fitting and the perfect length if you like a dress more on the shorter side (not too short). What I liked best is that it has shorts underneath so you can feel comfortable about it being short. The only drawback is you cannot really wear a regular bra without the straps showing a little. This is because the neck is square and comes wide so that the straps can show a little, however, if you  wear, say a demi bra or strapless that will not be a problem. I would recommend

评论概述: Super cute but not for me
评论详情: I am pretty heavy up top so although the dress was super cute and the perfect color, I couldn't wear to my golf outing. Would probably purchase in a larger size to see if there's any difference.

I actually dressed this fit up for a wedding by wearing some heels and gold accessories and it was a HIT. Fits so well! Will be able to wear biking or just as athleisure too depending on the shoes. Will be buying in more colors :-)

I love this dress a lot! My onlyyyy issue with it is it’s way longer on me than I expected. It goes right above my knee. ( I’m 5’4) I ordered a medium. I may exchange it for a small and see if it fits more to my liking. But over all super cute and comfy dress! Can be casual or dressed up.

Overall this is a pretty cute dress that is perfect for golfing or tennis. I got this in a small and it fits rather well. The only thing is if you are like me and have a short torso the shoulders were a bit long. But they are manageable enough to where they aren't slipping off!
Great dress. Super comfy and feels high quality. Easy to dress up or down. Will be getting more colors!

Super flattering for my bust. Shorts are shorter than expected being a tennis dress but my thighs are larger than my butt so not as much of a problem. I don't have to wear a bra but I should have sized up given my shoulders and boobs.. going to the bathroom in this will be more challenging than I want it to be, but I am overall pleased with what I received.

My new favorite. I wear it ALL THE TIME. even bought it in a long sleeve version. It’s slimming too which is awesome. Great for girls that are curvy and never have a great mini option. I wear it casual and on date nights. I always get looooks. Def recommend . You do have to get nakey to go potty- so that sucks. But oh well

Ordered XL. Man, I want to love this dress. I love the length and the cut. I’m about a size 10 with some stubborn belly fat. This dress is not forgiving on the mid section.  I could see myself ordering this again for fall if I drop about 4 inches off my waist.  I was able to get my DD into the dress and held decently well without a bra.

This dress is super comfortable and flattering!! it's definitely not cotton--it's like a bathing suit/ soccer shorts material. The shorts make it wearable and provide full bottom coverage. For reference I am 5"3 125 lbs and hourglass-- I carry weight in my upper arms and the sleeves are not too tight for me. It is a little loose around my waist but a small would be too small for me. hope this helps!
It needs to be just a bit longer. But looks great

评论概述: I have received so many complaints from this
评论详情: I bought this outfit and should have gone up a size. I purchased a medium, but it was a bit snug. It’s a tennis dress with built-in shorts, so I didn’t need to wear a bra. If you do need a bra, make sure it’s strapless because the straps will show at the corners. It’s so easy to throw on with a pair of slides, and I can chase my kids around comfortably.

This dress was very flattering and comfortable! Its very flattering and the material is stretchy and comfy! The only downside was that white color was a tiny bit see through at the top and the whole dress needs to come off for the restroom. Other than that, it’s a great active dress!
Had to size up but the material is great
One of my favorite comfy fits !

Bought this for my Europe trip.. really debated getting it at all but figured I’d have time to return it if I didn’t like it. oh my goodness I’m so glad I ordered it! it’s a 1000/10. SO breathable, color is exactly as the photo, fit is perfect, honestly probably could’ve gone down a size but I think the arms might’ve been a bit too tight if I did. You need it!

评论概述: Shorts are shorter than dress. Size up!

评论概述: Perfect athletic dress for any occasion!
评论详情: Pleasantly surprised by this dress! The fabric is super soft and stretchy. The shorts and under layer of the entire dress is an athletic breathable fabric and then the outer layer is soft and smooth. I put it on and asked my husband what he thought of it for an athletic dress and he turned around and said “Yes! Definitely yes! Looks like you could wear it out to dinner.” It’s perfect for a day of tennis, to BBQ’s to getting a drink with friends.
Beautiful dress really compliments the body, Great fit and material.

Fit, the shorts were too tight and kept riding up and the armpits were too tight as well. Everywhere fit great except for the sleeve area and shorts. It’s still cute and I’ll probably wear it on a day when I don’t care about it as much. I’m pretty skinny around my waist so there was plenty of room there. It’s just that I my arms and legs aren’t super skinny so it’s hard to find dresses or shirts that fit well there. hope this review helps.
Is nice, great material, love the fit but is weird to put on and also to go to the bathroom, overall I like it
This dress fits very nice and is super comfortable. Don’t really need a bra either!
THIS dress is adorable purchased this for a trip to Portugal and it looked so cute dressed up with a cute sandal and also with a pair of sneakers purchased multiple colors

I ordered the Amazon suggested size & it was way too tight for me. I reordered and sized up 2 times from my normal since I didn’t want it to be tight or cling to my mama pouch. Sizing up was perfect for me. Still fitted in top (36D), but flows away from my belly. Normal size is medium & I’m keeping XL.
Great dress. Very fitted and cute. Can be worn with sneakers or sandals to dress it up a bit.
Thick material and perfect length

I did not expect this to be as perfect as it is. The dress itself is stretchy but also tight enough that it sucks you in and holds you up in all the right places. The built in shorts are the perfect length so they don’t peek out of the bottom and I love that they have pockets!
Perfect length, love the slit. Im 5’2 179 lbs and got the XL

The way this material squishes you in and makes you feel so protected. Has shorts underneath which makes it a very comfy dress for any purpose. I used to it to party in so I was comfortable but looked nice too! Just bought another one in a different colour. Totally worth it.
It ran big for the fit that i wanted. I downsized and loved it !!!! Its perfect i downsized to a medium for a tight fit

I ordered my normal size xl and it fit a bit snug which cause the waist area to scrunch up and made my dress shorter exposing my rear of i barely bent over. If I dropped something I would be screwed. You can't wear a bra with it due to the neck line.
Very thick material and it fits nice. Depending your preference and body type size accordingly because it’s fitter at the top than bottom. Other than that pretty cute
The material is stretchy, lightweight, and true to the original color online. It has built in shorts! Only downside is no built in bra, but that’s an easy fix.

5’7, 125 pounds, DD.  Got the small. I would get a smaller size if you are 100 pounds, the S is not tight pretty loose. Not too showy in the breast. Can be pulled down or up to make appropriate. Not too short at all. I was scared of that. Super comfy. Nice enough material to wear to a wedding or you can go to this in the gym

I’ve gotten so many compliments I can’t even count even moms are like give me the deer’s were u get that dress??? I’m like girl on your phone order it NOW FROM AMAZON! I didn’t want to buy it initially because of the price. I bought a cheaper one then ended up being disappointed. Decided to buy this one and it fits perfectly. The shorts inside are also perfect. I have bigger thighs and it didn’t cut off my circulation.
Small fits more like a medium and isn’t form fitting. I’m 5’2 115lbs and small was lose on shoulders and bubbled around the waist. Great quality of fabric. Wish it fit better
